origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicIndicatorAPI.get_data', 'description': 'This function provides real-time economic indicators for a specified country.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the economic indicators are requested.'}, {'name': 'indicators', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of economic indicators to retrieve, e.g., GDP, unemploymentRate.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the requested economic indicators with their current values.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicIndicatorAPI.get_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'Norway', 'indicators'是['GDP', 'unemploymentRate'].
